name: Chocolate Brownies Vegan
description: Vegan Chocolate Brownies made with dates and coconut oil. Super delicious, a great sweet treat when you need a chocolate fix. Vegan Recipe.
recipeYield: 8 servings (Makes about 3/4 inch high loaf in 8 by 4 inch bread loaf pan)
recipeIngredient: 3 Tablespoons cocoa powder ((1 Tablespoon more for darker))
4  mejbool dates chopped or pureed ((can be substituted by 2 Tablespoons sugar))
1 teaspoon vanilla extract or instant coffee (or any mild spice)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the dates without pits in warm water for half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the dates without pits in warm water for half an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, blend dates, sugar, salt, lemon juice, agave, oils, flax, cocoa powder with 1/3 cup of water.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, blend dates, sugar, salt, lemon juice, agave, oils, flax, cocoa powder with 1/3 cup of water.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add the flours and the chocolate chips. Add the date puree.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add the flours and the chocolate chips. Add the date puree.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix till just about combined. Add more water if needed to get a thick batter. Taste batter and adjust sweetness to taste(since I usually make my baked goods mildly sweet). You can adjust the cocoa powder too. The color of the brownie will be a mildy deeper shade of the batter. Add nuts if you like. I added some chopped almonds in the brunette version.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix till just about combined. Add more water if needed to get a thick batter. Taste batter and adjust sweetness to taste(since I usually make my baked goods mildly sweet). You can adjust the cocoa powder too. The color of the brownie will be a mildy deeper shade of the batter. Add nuts if you like. I added some chopped almonds in the brunette version.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop and smooth batter in prepared pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop and smooth batter in prepared pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15-20 minutes till top is not jiggly and a toothpick inserted comes out almost clean. The darker batch was baked to just about done and looks gooey, while the brunette batch was baked a bit more( and also had a little baking powder) and looks more cakey.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 15-20 minutes till top is not jiggly and a toothpick inserted comes out almost clean. The darker batch was baked to just about done and looks gooey, while the brunette batch was baked a bit more( and also had a little baking powder) and looks more cakey.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool on rack before slicing. Serve with vegan icecream or fruit compote or melted chocolate !
recipeInstructions.name: Cool on rack before slicing. Serve with vegan icecream or fruit compote or melted chocolate !

recipeInstructions.text: You can chop up the dates and add to the brownie instead of the date puree. Add 2-3 Tablespoons more oil for a gooeyier brownie. Have a fantastic day!
recipeInstructions.name: You can chop up the dates and add to the brownie instead of the date puree. Add 2-3 Tablespoons more oil for a gooeyier brownie. Have a fantastic day!
